channel.title: Salem - VPS Hosted
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]SALEM[/size][/center] [center]Salem - 24/7 Uptime, Dungeoneering, Construction, Pking, Fully Working Switching, Turmoil.[/center]
[size=10pt]Website[/size] [url=http://www.salemps.com]www.Salemps.com[/url]
[size=10pt]Download[/size] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/ybj4ysxtof2nq3g/Salem.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ybj4ysxtof2nq3g/Salem.jar?dl=0[/url]
[center]Salem is a 317 server loading higher data, we mix our revisions of maps and items. At Salem even the smallest bug is important and we are able to say we update more than most of the other servers out there. Our staff team at Salem comes with alot of experience and are always looking to help. We are here to succeed and make Salem 1 of the best servers there are, you could even make a friend or two. [/center]
[size=10pt]Features[/size] * 100% Uptime * Daily Updates * Dungeoneering * Dwarf Milticannon * Full Summoning Skills * Complete Clan Chat * Full Pking * Flawless Combat * Jad * F2P Arena * Active Community Forum * Bossing * Loyalty Points * Friendly and Active Staff * Custom Shops * Multiple Point Systems * Nex * Guilded Altars * Crystal Key Chest * Barrows * Pest Control * World 2 (COMING SOON)
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f9hZ87zwnYA[/youtube]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hnCfaTFKFPs[/youtube]
